statements: SELECT * FROM customer_behavior_analysis
SELECT customer_id, behavior_type FROM customer_behavior_analysis WHERE behavior_type = 'click'
SELECT customer_id, event_timestamp FROM customer_behavior_analysis ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC
SELECT DISTINCT behavior_type FROM customer_behavior_analysis
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM customer_behavior_analysis WHERE event_timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior_analysis WHERE behavior_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC
SELECT customer_id, behavior_type FROM customer_behavior_analysis WHERE event_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND event_timestamp <= '2022-01-31'
SELECT DISTINCT behavior_type FROM customer_behavior_analysis WHERE behavior_type IN ('click', 'purchase') ORDER BY behavior_type DESC
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM customer_behavior_analysis GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_events >= 5 ORDER BY total_events DESC
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM customer_behavior_analysis GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC, customer_id ASC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, purchase_date, amount FROM customers LEFT JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT customers.name, purchases.product_id, purchases.amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchases.purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT customers.name, COUNT(purchases.purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM customers LEFT JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id GROUP BY customers.name;
SELECT customers.name, purchases.amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE customers.name = 'Alice' AND purchases.amount > 100.00;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_age BETWEEN 18 AND 60 ORDER BY customer_age
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 50 ORDER BY product_price
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT * FROM purchases p JOIN customers c ON p.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE c.customer_age >= 25 ORDER BY p.purchase_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, order_date FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT customer_name, age, email FROM customers;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, purchase_date, amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, order_date, quantity FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id;

SELECT customer_name, email, product_name, price, order_date, quantity FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000
SELECT product_id, name, category FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT customer_id, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT feedback_id, rating, comments FROM feedback
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE orders.total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, name, age FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY age;
SELECT p.name, p.price, t.amount FROM products p JOIN transactions t ON p.product_id = t.product_id WHERE t.amount > 50 ORDER BY t.amount DESC;

SELECT c.name, o.order_date, t.amount, f.rating FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN transactions t ON o.order_id = t.order_id LEFT JOIN feedback f ON t.transaction_id = f.transaction_id WHERE f.rating >= 4 ORDER BY o.order_date ASC;
